column2: Apatzingán de la Constitución) is a city and its surrounding municipality
column3: in the west-central region of the Mexican state of Michoacán.

column1: The Municipality of Apatzingán is located in the Tierra Caliente Valley. It has an area of 1
The city of Apatzingán is the sixth-largest in Michoacán (behind Morelia
The major Sierra Madre del Sur mountain range and the municipality of Coalcomán de Vázquez Pallares are to the west.
Mexico's Constitution of Apatzingán was signed in the city in 1814
column2: during the Mexican War of Independence in the Viceroyalty of New Spain against the Spanish Empire.

column1: Six federal police officers were charged with murder on August 21
column2: 2019 for their supposed involvement in a police operation that left nine dead on January 6
column3: 2015 in Apatzingán. At least nine people died and several were injured when police fired against members and sympathizers of self-defense groups who had taken over the municipal palace.

column1: Despite having an annual precipitation of 752 millimetres (29.6 in)
column2: Apatzingán has a semi-arid climate (Köppen climate classification Bsh) due to its hot temperatures and high evaporation rates.
